channel.description: Recent content in password tool on Tushar Chandra

item.title: How I built my (old) website
item.description:
You may have noticed that the Github repo for this website has a tagline “… for people who aren’t web developers.” I am a data scientist and certainly fit that description, and so I’m going to talk about how I built this site using the tools I already know.

Update (Jan. 2, 2020): This post is outdated! See Migrating to Hugo for information on the new site.

item.title: Smart Join Algorithms for Fighting Skew at Scale
About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Tushar. I’m a data scientist at Nielsen in Chicago, IL. I have an interest in human-computer interaction and how technology & new media are affecting our lives. On this site, I write summaries of papers that interest me along with other articles or talks. I can be reached at: Github: tuchandra Email: me [at] tusharc [dot] dev Projects I take pride in identifying problems and building tools to fix them.
